title: Extend Create Investment with e-Projects Deposits and Multi-Mode Transaction Verification

requirements.text: Add a 'Default Deposits on e-Projects' dropdown field in the InvestmentForm component with the following 38 secoinfi-apps options: e-contract-lwf, e-contracts-bqe, etutorial-lgc, etutorials-cso, evolved-ai-o6e, forms-sxn, geo-map-w9s, golden-sec-vri, ia-niqaw-947, icp-cloud-storage-hvk, infi-loop-1au, infytask-mia, ipfs-lrm, key-unlock-5hx, map-56b, moap-app-6ag, multi-apps-unify-app-hbc, n8n-tasks-c2i, n8n-workflows-6sy, networth-htm, op-hotels-rests-ae0, pvt-projects-7wo, sec-build-0bj, sec-epay-am0, sec-jewelry-j03, secoin-ep6, sitemap-hub-fe2, sitemap-hub-sy0, sitemap-nya, sitemap-subs-app-j3h, sitemaps-fwh, sudeep-hotels-eu8, terror-uproot-97d, trends-63c, trends-d1l, voice-invoice-au1, xcaller-0aw, yo-data-app-o7u. This dropdown should only be accessible and visible to users with ADMIN role.

quotes: As Extension to "Create New Investment" section include new Default Deposits on e-Projects with options Menu list of secoinfi-apps

acceptanceCriteria: Dropdown is visible in InvestmentForm only when user role is ADMIN
All 38 e-project options are available in the dropdown
Selected e-project value is stored with the investment

requirements.text: Store the selected e-project value in the backend Investment type by adding an eProject field of type ?Text to the Investment record in main.mo.
acceptanceCriteria: Investment record includes optional eProject field
Selected e-project is persisted when creating new investments

requirements.text: Add a 'Mode' dropdown field to TransactionForm with options: GPay, Crypto, CBDC, Wallets. This field should be required for all fund transactions.

quotes: For each Funds Txn include its Mode : Ex: GPay/Crypto/CBDC/Wallets

acceptanceCriteria: Mode dropdown appears in TransactionForm with 4 options
Mode selection is required before transaction submission
Selected mode is included in transaction data

requirements.text: Add two transaction ID fields to TransactionForm: a required 'Txn ID' numeric input field (Nat type) and an optional 'Txn ID (Text)' text input field.

quotes: Trn ID input field as NatValue, optional Txn ID as stringValue too

acceptanceCriteria: Numeric Txn ID field accepts only natural numbers and is required
Text Txn ID field accepts alphanumeric strings and is optional
Both fields are submitted with transaction data

requirements.text: Update the Transaction type in main.mo to include three new fields: mode of type Text, txnIdNat of type Nat, and txnIdText of type ?Text.
acceptanceCriteria: Transaction record stores payment mode
Transaction record stores numeric transaction ID
Transaction record stores optional text transaction ID

requirements.text: Display a prominent notice in TransactionForm that reads: 'After successful Deposit to Our UPI A/c: secoin@uboi, Pl. verify the Trn ID by submitting details here & Send a Copy by Chat to https://wa.me/919620058644. Include Crypto Deposits receipts as Txn ID after sending Ethereum on ERC20 Mainnet to Our Eth ID: 0x4a100E184ac1f17491Fbbcf549CeBfB676694eF7. Pl. Recheck & Verify if Details to be Submitted is Correct.'

quotes: Also Provide Notice: After successful Deposit to Our UPI A/c : secoin@uboi, Pl. verify the Trn ID by submitting details here & Send a Copy by Chat to https://wa.me/919620058644

acceptanceCriteria: Notice is displayed prominently in TransactionForm
UPI account 'secoin@uboi' is included in the notice
WhatsApp link https://wa.me/919620058644 is clickable
Ethereum address 0x4a100E184ac1f17491Fbbcf549CeBfB676694eF7 is displayed
Notice reminds users to verify details before submission

requirements.text: Add a confirmation dialog or review step in TransactionForm that displays all entered transaction details before final submission, allowing users to verify the information is correct.

quotes: Pl. Recheck & Verify if Details to be Submitted is Correct

acceptanceCriteria: User can review all transaction details before submission
Confirmation step includes mode, both transaction IDs, amount, and type
User must explicitly confirm before transaction is created

requirements.text: Update TransactionList and TransactionsList components to display the new transaction fields: mode, numeric transaction ID, and text transaction ID (when present).
acceptanceCriteria: Transaction list displays payment mode for each transaction
Both transaction ID fields are visible when available
Layout accommodates new fields without breaking existing display

constraints: The e-projects dropdown must only be accessible to users with ADMIN role
Preserve existing Investment and Transaction record structures by adding new optional fields
Maintain the existing session-based integrity tracking system
Keep all Motoko logic within the single main actor file
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui
nonGoals: Integration with actual payment gateways or blockchain networks
Admin interface for managing the e-projects list
